answers.answer: Hi there.  Very sorry to hear about the protein and preeclampsia.  Actually the risk is to YOU.  Your heart rate can get so high that you have a stroke. They deliver the baby ads the cure----  but it is for your safety.  Preeclampsia is dangerous to the mama, hon.  Most likely, they'll try to lower your blood pressure. Do you know your BP numbers?  Or is not that high but they've found protein?
My blood pressure was elevated last week...i had a appointment yesterday and it was normal...guess i better wait for the results :( thank you for responding

I had pre eclampsia questioned when I was around the same stage as you. All the same protein plus elevated BP plus swelling in my calf's and ankles which didn't go down with rest. After many blood test they cleared me of it. at the time the Drs and midwifes wouldn't tell me much. They only told me once ally test had came back.  I was about 3 weeks when I got cleared from It.

Im a NICU nurse and have been in delivery rooms with women who have preclampsia. Having high protein in your urine can be caused by anything. If your urine is very dark you could also be dehydrated. Try drinking a couple glasses of water. Preclampsia can be dangerous for both you and baby. What happens is your blood pressure and heart rate will increase and your baby's heart rate will become increased as well. In some cases doctors don't see a huge concern if everything is border line. If the doctor isn't too concerned about it just drink plenty of fluids and healthy foods. If the doctor thought it was that extreme to both of you you would have been enduised to make sure you and the baby are not harmed. You can call your doctor andbrequest more info. If he tells you he's not too concerned with it because you are border line for it. Take it easy and don't stress yourself out. Best of luck!!

Thank you! I've been a little concerned because I'm in sorta the same situation. I have bad swelling and high blood pressure and I'm already on a low sodium diet. But now that I have a little more information I do feel a bit better.
Thank you so much for the information! Makes me feel so much better my doctor told me not to worry about it much and just drink water as much as i can :)

question: I need to know about risk preeclampsia has on my baby i went to the doctor last Wednesday and was told they found protein in my urine my urine is very orange like color and im extremely worried about my baby im 27 weeks and my doctor really didnt give me much information on it...did anyone here have it or has it and what can i do to help it ? I cant stop thinking and worrying about it...im collecting urine and taking itt o the doctor tomorrow morning for lab test i didnt even know this thing existed please help thank you!:(
title: preeclampsia ? help
